title: Lonely Player Looking for someone to play with
body:
Hey guys, I don't really have many friends on this server and I got bored because I usually play just by myself. Normal, ranked and also ranking does not really matter. I want to chit chat and play league all day :3
Please add me :3

*I usually go support.

*I used to be gold.

replies.body:
I'd be happy to play! I'm feeling bored too so feel free to add me

I'm online most of the time so we could play whenever
